# Setup
## Dependencies
```{r setup}
library(BiocManager)
Biocpackages = c("DESeq2")
for (pkg in Biocpackages) {
    if (!require(pkg,quietly=T,character.only = T)) {
        BiocManager::install(pkg)
        library(pkg,character.only = T)
    }
}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```
